bug.author: matt-deboer
bug.summary: Order dataset images alphabetically by image name
bug.description: Enhancement: For datasets which originate from video sequences, it is useful to preserve the original ordering of frames. It would be nice if the images are presented in the UI in alphabetic by image name. Video slicers (e.g., ffmpeg) are going to produce video files named sequentially, and preserving alphabetic ordering of the file names will present them for annotation in their original order.

comments.comment: My mistake..I was looking at image ids.
